title: Emerald Teardrop Diamond Necklace - Manohari Kanthi
features: Delicate floral design interspersed with bezel-set diamonds. The centerpiece features a captivating pear-shaped emerald, framed by a halo of smaller diamonds in a pav√© setting. The gold chain is designed for comfort and durability with a discreet clasp. The design takes inspiration from traditional 'Addigai' patterns but with a contemporary twist.
description: This necklace seamlessly blends contemporary design with a touch of traditional South Indian elegance. The dazzling diamonds and rich emerald create a sophisticated and eye-catching piece. The high-quality craftsmanship and materials ensure lasting beauty and value. It's a statement piece that exudes both grace and confidence.
